Today, Gower is seeing weak conditions with 2 ft @7s E swell and fresh 8 mph ENE winds. Tomorrow, similar 2 ft @8s SSE swell continues but with stronger 26 mph E winds, making it blown out. By the day after, conditions improve slightly with 1 ft @12s WSW swell, offering a better chance at Llangennith Beach and Oxwich Bay during the mid-tide windows. Best: day after.
